unnormalised: Arre yaar, hea biryani recipe-ant 250 gms tandull ghal mhanta, punn mhojem measuring scale holiday-er gel'lem dista! Mhojea "andaaz" vaprun quantity guess kortam, mhaka shubhechha di ani ash kar ki ti khichdi zanvchi nhoi mhunn.
normalised: Arre yaar, hya biryani recipe-nt dhonnso panchvis gram tandull ghal mhonta, punn mhojem mapchem scale sutti ghevnk gela! Mhajea “andaaz”-an quantity kitli asa ten guess korta, mhaka best of luck di ani asho kor ki tem khichdi zanvchena.
text: Arre yaar, hea biryani recipe-ant 250 gms tandull ghal mhanta, punn mhojem measuring scale holiday-er gel'lem dista! Mhojea "andaaz" vaprun quantity guess kortam, mhaka shubhechha di ani ash kar ki ti khichdi zanvchi nhoi mhunn.
